content: द्वारं [द्वृ-णिच्-अच् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A door, gateway, gate. {@--2@} A passage, entrance, ingress, opening; अथवा कृतवाग्द्वारे वंशेऽस्मिन् <ls>R. 1. 4</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 18.</ls> {@--3@} An aperture of the human body; (they are nine); see खं and <ls>Ku. 3. 50</ls>, <ls>Bg. 8. 12</ls>, and <ls>Ms. 6. 48</ls> also. {@--4@} Way, medium, means (द्वारेण ‘through’ ‘by means of’; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>). --री A door.
